name: Windows Manage Enable Remote Desktop
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
description:
This module enables the Remote Desktop Service (RDP). It provides the options to create
          an account and configure it to be a member of the Local Administrators and
          Remote Desktop Users group. It can also forward the target's port 3389/tcp.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: The username of the user to create.

options.name: ENABLE
options.description: Enable the RDP Service and Firewall Exception.

options.name: FORWARD
options.description: Forward remote port 3389 to local Port.

options.name: LPORT
options.description: Local port to forward remote connection.
